purpose: Runs all coherence validations across the full domain configuration and displays a summary of errors, orphans, and warnings grouped by category
Manages the list of agent action definitions, providing selection, creation, editing, and deletion of actions alongside a detail panel for the selected action
Manages the list of agent action definitions, providing selection, creation, editing, and deletion of actions alongside a detail panel for the selected action
Renders an interactive force-directed graph visualizing causal relationships between pressures, generators, systems, and actions so users can understand feedback loops in a domain configuration
Renders an interactive force-directed graph visualizing causal relationships between pressures, generators, systems, and actions so users can understand feedback loops in a domain configuration
Displays a sortable breakdown of how often each entity kind, relationship kind, tag, and culture is referenced across generators, systems, actions, and pressures
Displays a sortable breakdown of how often each entity kind, relationship kind, tag, and culture is referenced across generators, systems, actions, and pressures
Renders an expandable card for a single era, allowing the user to edit its name, description, template weights, pressure configuration, and successor era
Manages the ordered list of era definitions, letting users add, reorder, and delete eras while delegating per-era editing to expandable EraCard components
Renders an expandable card for a single era, allowing the user to edit its name, description, template weights, pressure configuration, and successor era
Shows a tabbed modal dialog for editing all aspects of a generator definition including overview, target selection, applicability rules, variables, creation instructions, relationships, and effects
Manages the full list of generator configurations, providing a searchable list view with per-card enable toggles and opening a detail modal when a generator is selected
Manages the full list of generator configurations, providing a searchable list view with per-card enable toggles and opening a detail modal when a generator is selected
Shows a tabbed modal dialog for editing all aspects of a generator definition including overview, target selection, applicability rules, variables, creation instructions, relationships, and effects
Renders a compact summary card for a single generator in the list, showing its name, subtype, validation badges, and an enable/disable toggle
Edits a single traversal step in a graph path assertion, letting users configure the relationship kind, direction, and optional entity kind filter for that hop
Edits a single constraint on a graph path assertion, allowing the user to specify which entity reference must be reached and how at a given path position
Edits a graph-path assertion used in generator selection, letting users build a multi-hop traversal with existence or non-existence checks and intermediate constraints
Edits a single selection filter for a generator target query, displaying type-specific fields in a collapsible card so users can refine which entities are targeted
Manages the ordered list of selection filters for a generator, providing add-via-type-menu, remove, and per-filter editing so users can compose complex target queries
Presents a dropdown picker of available applicability rule types and calls back with the chosen type when the user selects one, with nesting-depth-aware option filtering
Edits a single applicability rule (such as a pressure threshold, era check, or logical combinator) in an expandable card that recursively renders nested child rules
Provides the applicability rules panel within the generator modal, listing all rules with add, edit, and remove controls that determine when the generator fires
Provides the overview panel within the generator modal for editing the generator's id, name, description, subtype, culture, enabled state, and for triggering delete or duplicate
Provides the target selection panel within the generator modal, letting users choose the selection strategy, entity kind filters, saturation limits, and selection filters
Provides the variables panel within the generator modal, letting users define named entity-query variables that can be referenced in creation and relationship steps
Provides the entity creation panel within the generator modal, where users configure what entity kinds, names, tags, and attributes each generator run produces
Provides the relationships panel within the generator modal for configuring which relationships are created between the target, created entities, and resolved variables
Provides the effects panel within the generator modal for configuring state updates and pressure changes that the generator applies when it fires
Displays a table showing how each entity subtype maps to a naming culture profile, highlighting gaps and warnings where subtypes lack an assigned naming profile
Displays a table showing how each entity subtype maps to a naming culture profile, highlighting gaps and warnings where subtypes lack an assigned naming profile
Manages the list of pressure definitions, providing per-pressure expand/collapse, inline editing of factors, and a factor modal with persisted scroll position

Renders a select input for choosing a single value from a list of labeled options, optionally showing a secondary metadata string beside each option
Renders a multi-value chip selector where users toggle options on or off to build an array of selected values
Renders a button-triggered searchable popup that lets users filter and select one item from a potentially long list
Renders a horizontal row of labeled level buttons so users can pick a categorical or ordered level value, with an optional numeric input for exact values
Renders a controlled numeric input that parses and validates the entered value, only propagating valid numbers to the parent via onChange
Renders a textarea that buffers edits locally while focused and only propagates the committed value to the parent on blur, preventing disruptive re-renders during typing
Renders a styled toggle switch that reports enabled/disabled state changes and supports an optional descriptive label beside it
Renders a compact icon-only button with optional danger styling and a tooltip, used for destructive or secondary actions in dense editor UIs
Renders a styled informational callout box with an optional title, used to surface contextual help or explanatory notes inside editor panels
Renders a titled section header with optional description, icon, count badge, and right-aligned action slots to introduce a group of related editor controls
Renders a centered empty-state illustration with icon, title, description, and optional action content when a list or panel has no items to display
Renders an expandable category group with an icon, label, and item count that toggles to show or hide its contained list items
Renders a dashed placeholder card that users click to trigger item creation, styled as an empty slot in a card grid
Renders a labeled add button for appending a new item to a list, styled consistently across all editor sections
Renders a full-screen modal overlay with a consistent header containing icon, title, and optional tabs, plus a close button and optional disabled badge
Renders a single row with a name label, arbitrary child controls, and an optional remove button, used as a uniform layout primitive in list editors
Edits a map of pressure-id-to-delta-value pairs, letting users add pressures from the available list and set numeric change amounts for each
Renders a small error count badge that summarizes the number of validation errors on a card or tab, returning nothing when the count is zero
Renders a small warning badge indicating that an item is not referenced by any era, returning nothing when the item is not an orphan
Renders a small numeric badge on a modal tab to surface the count of validation issues for that tab's content
Renders a compact row of era name chips up to a configurable maximum, with an overflow indicator when more eras are present than shown
